access_token.Description: Access token to use to access Terraform Enterprise; the ATLAS_TOKEN environment variable is used if this argument is not set

address.Description: Base URL for your Terraform Enterprise installation; the ATLAS_ADDRESS environment variable is used if this argument is not set, finally falling back to a default of 'https://atlas.hashicorp.com/' if neither are set.

name.Description: Full name of the environment in Terraform Enterprise, such as 'myorg/myenv'
